items.title: Mint Candy Skull
items.summary: The Mint Candy Skull is one of ten designs in stitched.eth's Candy Skull series by Crude Things. The owner of each of the NFTs in this series is granted an exclusive copyright license to produce clothing featuring this artwork, subject to the Non-fungible Token Agreement, limited…
items.content_html:
The Mint Candy Skull is one of ten designs in stitched.eth's Candy Skull series by Crude Things. The owner of each of the NFTs in this series is granted an exclusive copyright license to produce clothing featuring this artwork, subject to the Non-fungible Token Agreement, limited to a maximum of 1,000 clothing applications per year. 
  • Subject Work Name: Mint Candy Skull
  • Subject Work Series Title: Candy Skull by Crude Things
  • Yearly Allocation for this Subject Work: 1,000
  • Current Allocation: 1,000 
  • Ethereum Contract Address: 0xb39d55e3fccf30700323b71d83fd103b227b309f
  • Artist / Creator: Crude Things
  • Artist's Copyright Assignment
  • Non-fungible Token Agreement REVIEW THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY prior to acquiring the NFT.

Copyright Limitations

The use of the copyright embedded in this NFT is subject to important limitations, terms and conditions of the Non-fungible Token Agreement linked above. Acquiring or minting this NFT or attempting to invoke any of the rights granted by the license contained in the Non-fungible Token Agreement constitutes your electronic signature and consent to this agreement.  If you intend to manufacture clothing with this artwork, you may also contact the artist in advance of acquiring the NFT. 

Production & Allocation History

Event Current Allocation After Event
Yearly Allocation for 2022: +1,000 1,000

items.title: Lana's Flower by Crude Things
items.summary: Lana's Flower by Crude Things was originally designed to be painted by hand onto fabric. The "Lana's Flower" subject work series consists of eight exclusive flower designs that are each limited to 1,000 clothing applications per year. Each of the NFTs in this series contain…
items.content_html:
Lana's Flower by Crude Things was originally designed to be painted by hand onto fabric. The "Lana's Flower" subject work series consists of eight exclusive flower designs that are each limited to 1,000 clothing applications per year. 

 

  • Subject Work Series Title: Lana's Flower by Crude Things
  • Yearly Item Limit for this Subject Work: 1,000
  • Ethereum Contract Address: 0xb39d55E3FcCF30700323B71D83fD103b227b309F
  • Artist: Crude Things
  • Link to Creator Copyright Assignment: [placeholder]

Each of the NFTs in this series contain an exlcusive copyright license embeded in the metadata. REVIEW THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY prior to acquiring the NFT. The use of the copyright embedded in this NFT is subject to important limitations and subject to the terms and conditions of this license agreement. Acquiring or minting this NFT or attempting to invoike any of the rights granted by the exclusive license contained in the metadata constitutes your electronic signature and consent to this agreement.
